document_data.name: ''Dragonguard''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Dragonguard''''' was an enchanted [[breastplate]] that protected the wearer from [[dragon]]'s breath.
document_data.Description: The plate of [[armor]] was well made. The plate was decorated to show the shape of a golden dragon.
document_data.Powers: ''Dragonguard'' had a ''+1'' enchantment, and allowed the wearer to have a higher chance of resisting the effects of dragon's breath.
document_data.History:
Some time in the 10{{th}} century [[DR]], the breastplate was specifically crafted for [[Tergon]] in the [[Forge of Spells]] of the [[Wave Echo Cave]].

''Circa'' [[1491 DR]],{{Phandelver-time}} it was guarded by a [[spectator]] that was summoned by the original [[mage]]s that dwelt in the cave.
